headline: Royal Caribbean: Strong Growth Prospects, But Valuation Leaves Little Room For Upside
summary: Royal Caribbean sees growth with high demand, premium pricing and robust margins. Elevated valuation suggests growth is priced in. See more on RCL stock here.

headline: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings to Hold Conference Call on Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: MIAMI, July 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd. (NYSE: NCLH) (together with NCL Corporation Ltd., “Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings” or the “Company”) announced today it will report second quarter 2025 financial results on Thursday, July 31, 2025 at 6:30 a.m. Eastern Time with a conference call and webcast to discuss results at 8:00 a.m. Eastern Time. The conference call will be webcast via the Company’s Investor Relations website, https://www.nclhltd.com/investors. A
